categories.title: Rent
categories.comment: At the end of the year, we sold our apartment. So we became renters. For this year it was only one night.

categories.title: Mortgage
categories.comment: We had a mortgage for the investment property. But none for the apartment we lived.

categories.title: Utilities
categories.comment: Electricity, water, apartment building service.

categories.title: Tax
categories.comment: Residence tax for the previous year.

categories.title: Repairs
categories.comment: This is where things shrank. Almost all the work to finish our apartment I made myself. We ended up selling this beauty.

categories.title: Groceries
categories.comment: We cooked only breakfasts and dinners.

categories.title: Eating out
categories.comment: Most of our eating out were still sponsored by the employer.

categories.title: Alcohol
categories.comment: Beer for me, wine for missis.

categories.title: Gas
categories.comment: Driving to buy some materials for the home. Gas for our travels is in a different category.

categories.title: Maintenance
categories.comment: First major car repair. This time something went wrong with <abbr>ESP</abbr>.

categories.comment: TODO: taxes

categories.title: Insurance
categories.comment: Nastya's second year of driving. Premiums are still high.

categories.title: Parking
categories.comment: No driving to the city—no parking.

categories.title: Public transport
categories.comment: Monday—Friday commute to the center of the city.

categories.title: Car rent
categories.comment: One car-sharing trip for the year.

categories.title: Taxi
categories.comment: Nastya took fewer working hours. So, fewer taxi rides.

categories.title: Health Insurance
categories.comment: Got employer insurance for the family with 80% off.

categories.title: Doctor visits
categories.comment: Doctor visits that were not covered by insurance.

categories.title: Pharmacy
categories.comment: Vitamins and hormones.

categories.comment: Renting movies on Google Play and iTunes.

categories.comment: Few folk-singing classes.

categories.title: Clothing

categories.title: Tech & Gadgets
categories.comment: Used Macbook Pro, Google Pixel 3 for great photos.

categories.title: Home stuff
categories.comment: This was the year of getting rid of the home stuff.

categories.title: Work supplies
categories.comment: My working equipment was sponsored by the employer.

categories.title: Household goods
categories.comment: Cleaning, washing, toiletries, etc.

categories.title: Cell phone
categories.comment: This year we switched to a limited discount plan thanks to our friend.

categories.title: Subscriptions
categories.comment: Evernote and domain name.

categories.title: Personal
categories.comment: Nastya made some progress here.

categories.title: Misc
categories.comment: Some repairs and other spending.

categories.title: Hotels
categories.comment: Snowboarding in Slovakia and Saint-Petersburg. Summer trip to the mountains, Helsinki, and part of our next big trip.

categories.title: Travel Transportation
categories.comment: This was a year of car trips. We took only one flight to Helsinki.

categories.title: Travel Entertainment
categories.comment: Two season ski-passes for the next year.

categories.comment: Eating out and cooking in Airbnb rentals.

categories.comment: Birthday parties for both of us.

categories.title: Charity
categories.comment: To our shame almost nothing here.

categories.title: Taxes and fees
categories.comment: Income taxes and fees for selling sister's property.

categories.title: Fines
categories.comment: Almost good citizens.

categories.comment: We had some dividend income. I'll add it later.

categories.comment: Almost identical to the previous year.

categories.title: Side hustle

categories.title: Interest

categories.title: Stuff sales
categories.comment: This year we embraced minimalism and started getting rid of the stuff. We sold valuable books, gadgets, home stuff, etc.

categories.title: Presents

categories.comment: Our second and last year with BlaBlaCar. Great time!
